data.title: Business Insurance, Risk Management and Consulting Services
data.meta_description: Gallagher is a global business insurance, risk management and consulting services company, helping our clients and customers face their futures with confidence.
data.text:
Providing confidence every step of the way

Gallagher is a global business insurance, risk management and consulting services company offering clients and customers innovation and tenacity across 130 countries. We use our 90 years of intelligence and insight to protect what matters most: your business. We form lifelong partnerships with our clients and underwriters which, when combined with our world class data and analytics, helps our customers face their futures with confidence.

A history of integrity

Since 1927, Gallagher has led with integrity, ethics and purpose — the building blocks of The Gallagher Way.

Over 9.9 billion USD in revenues*

We're a global leader in business insurance. Bringing both economies of scale and the stability of over 90 years of excellence to your business.

*Revenue is total adjusted brokerage and risk management revenue.

Client service in over 130 countries

In a world of opportunities we're at your side. With a network of more than 960 offices across the globe. Because there's no substitute for local expertise.

More than 50 offices across the UK

From the City to the Isle of Skye, we’re part of the fabric of life throughout the country. Ready to do business wherever you do business.
